title: C-Kei Otome Renmei
alternative_title: Ｃ系乙女恋盟 ; C Kei Otome Renmei ; C系乙女恋盟
status: Ｃ系乙女恋盟 ; C Kei Otome Renmei ; C系乙女恋盟
description:
Description :
        The C-Girls. Cool= Hiromi. Cute= Chiharu. Clean=Kana.
Hiromi is the perfect and intelligent cool beauty. 
Chiharu is the carefree girl with looks that put idols to shame. 
Kana is the pure sweet angel. 

A series of one-shots about the C-Girls. Ultra-cute romances that come along with relationship life-lessons.

The War of Strawberry Au Lait
The Secret Behind the Red-Rimmed Glasses
Don't Call Me an Angel
Crazy Kiss

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2 : The Secret Behind The Red-Rimmed Glasses
Vol.1 Chapter 1 : The War Of Strawberry Au Lait
